DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of acupuncture for the induction of labor in pregnant women at the 40 weeks + 4 days of gestation.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Acupuncture on Induction of Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Women at 40+2-40+4 gestational age were allocated to receive acupuncture twice a week or observation in order to observe the efficacy of acupuncture in labour onset.
DOC.criteria: Physiological pregnant women at 40 weeks + 4 days of gestation Fetal or maternal disease
DOC.keyword: to evaluate acupuncture as possible alternative treatment for induction of labor
